## Topology of ...
- Manifolds 
- Simplicial Complexes 
- Absolute Deformation Retracts

## Characteristic tools:

- Surgery Theory (for classification of manifolds with Dimension > 4)

## Important Theorems:

- Geometrization Conjecture
- h-Cobordism Theorem
